XZ.sql:
Select m.provinceName as province_name,m.cityname as city_name,m.sheetid as orderId, rtrim(m.title) as orderTheme,m.customNo as customerId,m.customName as customerName, m.customServLevel as customerLev, rtrim(m.customServLevel) as customerLevId,'' as customerType,'' as customerTypeId, m.status as status,m.bservType as busType,m.bservType as busTypeId,'' as isLargeComplain,
rtrim(m.complaintDesc) as complainDetail,'' as complainNbr,m.productName as proId, m.circuitCode as circuitName,m.businessLevel as assuranceLev,rtrim(m.businessLevel) as assuranceLevId, '' as isAlarmMonitor,'' as alarmId,'' as isAlarmOrder,'' as alarmOrderId, m.complaintTime as complainStartTime,m.faultTime as AlarmStartTime,m.sendTime as orderStartTime, m.sheetCompleteLimit as limitTime,m.endTime as orderEndTime, (select max(rtrim(replace(dealresult,'char(9)','')) ) from GROUPCOMPLAINT_link where mainid = m.id and operatetime in (select max(operatetime) from GROUPCOMPLAINT_link where activeTemplateid='SecondExcuteHumTask' and operateType='46' group by mainid ) ) as complainResult, (select max(rtrim(replace(dealresult,'char(9)','')) ) from GROUPCOMPLAINT_link where mainid = m.id and operatetime in (select max(operatetime) from GROUPCOMPLAINT_link where activeTemplateid='SecondExcuteHumTask' and operateType='46' group by mainid ) ) as complainResultId,
(select min(taskname) from GROUPCOMPLAINT_task where sheetkey=m.id and taskstatus!='5') as orderState, (select max(taskname) from GROUPCOMPLAINT_task where sheetkey=m.id and taskstatus!='5' ) as orderStateId, (select distinct taskstatus from GROUPCOMPLAINT_task where sheetkey=m.id and taskstatus!='5' ) as taskstatus, (select isReplied from GROUPCOMPLAINT_link where mainid = m.id and operatetime in (select max(operatetime) from GROUPCOMPLAINT_link where activeTemplateid='SecondExcuteHumTask' and operateType='46' group by mainid ) ) as isContactCustomer,
'' as contactCustomerFirstTime,'' as pretreatmentTime,'' as preanalysisReason,'' as isSucPreanalysis, '' as taskTransferTime, '' as maintenanceCompany,
'' as maintenanceStartTime,'' as maintenanceDetail,'' as maintenanceResult, '' as isvisite,'' as arriveSceneTime,'' as removeAlarmTime,'' as recoFaultTime,'' as faulteChargeableCityName, '' as isoverTime,'' as overTimeResion,(select max(rtrim(issueEliminatReason)) from GROUPCOMPLAINT_link where mainid=m.id and activeTemplateid='FirstExcuteHumTask' and operateType='46' ) as problemResion, '' as problemResionId,'' as isConfirmResult,(select max(rtrim(linkCheckResult)) from GROUPCOMPLAINT_link where mainid=m.id and activeTemplateId='CheckingHumTask' ) as qcResult, (select max( rtrim(linkCheckIdea)) from GROUPCOMPLAINT_link where mainid=m.id and activeTemplateId='CheckingHumTask' ) as qcDetail, rtrim(m.faultType) as faultType,rtrim(m.faultType) as faultTypeId, m.connectType as accessWay,m.enterpriseCode as enterpriseId,m.serverCode as serviceId,'' as isVolumeFault, m.termType as terminalType,'' as calledNumberCityName,m.ecsiType as ecsiType,
'' as accgateIp,'' as accgateId,'' as mpiagSendMegTime,'' as isSusResponse,'' as mpiagResReportTime, '' as isSucResReport,m.apnName as apnName,'' as tunnelType,'' as vpnInstantiation, '' as ceIp,'' as customerIp from GROUPCOMPLAINT_MAIN m left join (select distinct mainid from GROUPCOMPLAINT_link link where operateTime>='@beginTime@' and operateTime<='@endTime@' ) l on m.id = l.mainid where m.id = l.mainid and (m.sendTime>='@beginTime@' and m.sendTime<='@endTime@') and m.deleted = '0'
